item.title: Fireside Chat with Simona Maschi (CIID)
item.description: Sketchnotes by Rasagy from Accel’s first Design Connect, where Akshay Verma (Founder, Prophecy) hosted a fireside chat with Simona Maschi (CEO, CIID) on teaching & practicing design.

item.title: Designing with Heart & Balance (DesignUp ✕ Atlassian)
item.description: Sketchnotes by Rasagy of a panel about transitioning across design roles by Atlassian, in collaboration with DesignUp.
